Docs.summary: The namespace contains a set of types that represent concepts throughout the models used by the Entity Framework and a set of classes that help applications to work with metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about how to use this namespace, see [ADO.NET Metadata](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5).
